tool_description: Get details of an appraiser license. Validate an appraiser license given lastname, state, and license from 55 US States. Data set is updated periodically. This API assists Appraisal and Real Estate Software .exe applications, Web Apps and Mobile Apps. Built for software that serves Appraisers, Realtors, Lending, Loan, Home Insurance Software Companies. Fast, less code, less load for your application and server. Save much more development time and for your software end-users.
name: Appraiser
title: Appraiser

api_list.name: GetLicenseDetails
api_list.description: Given Lastname, State, Appraiser License Number, API will return the details of each license (if there're many).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appraiser.p.rapidapi.com/GetLicenseDetails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appraiser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ValidateLicense
api_list.description:
Given Lastname, State, Appraiser License Number, API will evaluate and return if the license is valid or not based on the License Status and Expiration Date.

Response: valid=true when the License Expiration Date is still valid and License Status is active. Else, valid=false.
The response will include multiple licenses and the validity of each license of the same appraiser if any.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appraiser.p.rapidapi.com/ValidateLicense"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appraiser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
